attributes.title: wish i could rate lower!!
attributes.review: as a trump follower, i downloaded this app to get the latest on election plans and rallies i could attend. i set down my phone to let the app download as i watched Trumpâ€™s press conference, actually. when i return to my phone, i see that EVERY OTHER APP HAD BEEN DELETED, MY PHOTOS WIPED, MY CONTACTS ERASED. the only things i have on my phone as of right now are the base apple apps and this Trump app. i am very scared because if they took my contacts and photos, what else did they take?
